name: SmartPlan - Floor plan app using camera
description: SmartPlan is measurement app which create floor plan simply with the camera. Augmented reality (AR) technology is used for measurement.    feature: - Create floor plans with camera - Measurement of floor, walls, doors and windows - View plans in 2D and 3D models - View floor and walls - Share floor plan via email, message, etc - Supporting imperial and metric units - Supporting taking a photo of measurement
